channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260126)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Add Translation Toolbar UI and improve debug logging

  • Add TranslationToolbar with floating UI for translation feature
  • Add TranslationNetworkManager for centralized network handling
  • Enable verbose logging by default in Debug window
  • Add detailed logging to TypingBuffer for debugging
  • Improve TempOffToolbar styling and behavior
  • Fix settings persistence for translation toolbar visibility
  • Version 1.2.20 build 20260126

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
